48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Agharr Abu Muslim narrated that:He bears witness, from Abu Hurairah and Abu Sa’eed Al-Khudri, that they bear witness, from the Messenger of Allah, that he said: “There is no group that remembers Allah, except that the angels encompass them, mercy covers them, and tranquility descends upon them: and Allah remembers (mentions) them before those who are with Him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقَوْمِ يَجْلِسُونَ فَيَذْكُرُونَ اللَّهَ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ مَا لَهُمْ مِنَ الْفَضْلِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Concerning The Group That Sits to Remember Allah The Mighty And Sublime, What Virtues They Have
